comment: Fucking delicious. Soft malt profile, incredibly smooth bitterness, very balanced. Aroma is that of soft pilsner malt and fresh apricot. Full bodied, clean yeast profile. Brew this again. Condition/carbonate for a week in the keg. Keg hop for 4 days. Back on pressure for a few more days. Do not drink less than two weeks after kegging. The beer goes from a 6 to a 9-10 with time in the keg.
